title: The way champion interactions work for Aatrox is how all champs should be like.
body:
Seriously almost all of Aatrox’s taunts come from the first approach towards the enemy champion and it works beautifully and makes the world they’ve been building much more alive.

Meanwhile most champs (especially Aurelion Sol) have a massive selection of special taunts that are practically never used because you need to be:

-right next to then

-have to taunt

-only works 1/5th of the time.

You shouldn’t need to taunt to trigger these lines anyways, nobody taunts unless the animation when you spam it looks funny. Nobody thinks “lol let me get close to guy and taunt to trigger a SPECIAL voiceline”. All current taunt special interactions should be switched to automatic and there’s not really a reason why not.

~ By  [Qwik_Sand](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/8yhgpr/the_way_champion_interactions_work_for_aatrox_is/) from Reddit
